EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Resource Depot & Smelting Facility at base position (x=-4.5, y=18.5)
Consists of:
• Wooden Chest at (x=-4.5, y=18.5) serving as central storage.
• Stone Furnace at (x=-3.0, y=19.0) for iron smelting.
• Stone Furnace at (x=-4.0, y=21.0) for copper plate production.
• Burner Inserter at (x=0.5, y=21.5) with drop at (x=0.5, y=20.5)

### Automation Lab & Steam Power System (Integrated System) at base configuration
Consists of:
• Lab at (x=-7.5, y=18.5) dedicated to automation research – now reconnected to the Electric Pole at (x=16.5, y=13.5) via an updated Electricity Group.
• Electricity Group comprising small electric poles at positions (x=-0.5, y=11.5), (x=-7.5, y=15.5), (x=-4.5, y=15.5), (x=3.5, y=19.5), (x=1.5, y=22.5) plus additional ones at (x=-10.5, y=18.5), (x=-11.5, y=18.5), (x=-12.5, y=16.5).
• Steam Engines:
 – Primary engine at (x=-13.5, y=16.5)
 – Additional engines at (x=-14.5, y=13.5), (x=7.5, y=35.5), (x=8.5, y=20.5)
• Fluid System Submodule – Boiler Module comprising:
 – Pre-existing Boiler at (x=-13.5, y=19.0) with intermediate pipe at (x=-17.5, y=21.5) (fluid connection failed).
 – Existing new Boiler+Steam Engine Pair originally with boiler at (x=-14.0, y=16.5) then repositioned to (x=-10.0, y=22.5) with its steam engine at (x=-7.5, y=11.5) (connection unresolved).
 – Additional attempted Boiler+Steam Engine Pair with boiler at (x=-7.0, y=23.5) and steam engine at (x=1.5, y=28.5) (pipe connection unresolved).
 – NEW Boiler+Steam Engine Pair with boiler at (x=-2.0, y=15.5) and steam engine at (x=11.5, y=13.5) – now successfully connected with a PipeGroup (fluid_system=151295) comprising 61 pipes.

### Copper Extraction System (adjacent to the copper smelting furnace)

### Remote Fluid Integration System at remote region (approximate center: x=-30, y=40)
Consists of:

• Pipe Connection established via a PipeGroup starting at (x=-30.5, y=31.5) and extending to (x=-30.5, y=34.5).
• New segmented pipe connection attempt aimed at linking the Offshore Pump with the New Boiler (targeted near x=-10.0, y=22.5) remains unresolved.

### Expanded Smelting Zone (new)
Consists of:
• Stone Furnace at (x=-20.0, y=22.0) placed successfully.
• Stone Furnace at (x=-20.0, y=25.0) placed successfully.
• Stone Furnace at (x=-17.0, y=25.0) placed successfully.
• An intended Stone Furnace at (x=-17.0, y=22.0) that could not be placed due to a non-removable blocking PipeGroup at (x=-17.5, y=21.5).
Use-case: Increased furnace capacity to expand smelting operations.

────────────────────────
ERROR TIPS
• Inventory and Crafting Readiness:
 – Confirm availability of all required items—including raw resources like stone—to meet crafting prerequisites before initiating build actions.
 – Track inventory levels closely to avoid crafting failures such as the inability to craft stone furnaces due to missing raw stone.

• Placement Obstructions:
 – Verify target build positions are unobstructed and clear of non-removable entities before attempting placement.
 – When placement fails because of an existing object (for example, a PipeGroup blocking (x=-17.0, y=22.0)), consider alternative locations or pre-clearance strategies.

• Buildable Position Determination:
 – Ensure alternate candidate positions are validated with robust buildability checks.
 – Reassess spatial clearance methods if repeated alternate positions are found unbuildable.

• Clearing Blocking Entities:
 – Recognize that certain network elements (e.g. persistent PipeGroups) may be non-removable; plan the layout accordingly to avoid conflicts in critical build areas.
